descriptionHtml:
ITS JUST A SAVEGAME NOT A MOD! NO PATCH NEEDED TO USE!
THE STORY IS JUST FOR FUN!
I RECOMMEND USING THE MOD: Fairy tail MUSIC!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Nazu is not only a Dragon Slayer , he is was also the Guild Leader who got Betreyed by his Members!
Now u Escaped Helgen .. u got your Bows , Guild Master EQUIP, Your Ammos and your EPIC Soulstone

Now Its time to HUNT!

I made this savegame just for Players who has Expirience with the Game .
I made him so OP for this Reasons:

U should play that Game on HARD mode (u can also Hardcore .. then its really HARD)
I should play JUST with BOW or DAGGER ( U ARE AN ASSASIN)

PLease Try it out and Comment .

Its a Nice Start for a Harder Game. (And the Name is AWESOME)

U got At start:

-Guild Master Equip!
-2 Daedric BOWS (1 for Soulstoning and 1 for DMG)
-1 Azuras Star ( for Epic Soulstone)
-ALL KEYS ( YES U ARE AN ASSASIN! u NEED KEYS to CAMP SOMEONE)
-100 HP 100 MANA 160 STAMANIA

I really RECOMMEND THE MODS:


Normal WEAPONS
NO LOCKPICKS (or 10^^)
NO MAGIC
NO GOLD
NO OTHER ITEMS
NO PERKS ( just 1 or 2 skilled)

TRY it OUT! Its worth!

GOOD LUCK!
author: Etern4lPain
